{{Use mdy dates|date=April 2011}} {{BLP IMDB refimprove|only=yes|date=November 2009}} {{Infobox person | name = Colin Ford | image = Young sam winchester.jpg | caption = Colin as young [[Sam Winchester]] | birth_name = Colin Ford | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1996|9|12}} | birth_place = [[Nashville]], [[Tennessee]] | occupation = [[Actor]] | years_active = 2002âpresent }} '''Colin Ford''' (born September 12, 1996) is an American child actor and voice actor. He is best known for his role as young [[Sam Winchester]] in the 2005 TV Series, ''[[Supernatural (TV Series)|Supernatural]]''. ==Biography== Colin enjoyed being in front of the camera which led to his start in the entertainment business. At age 4, Colin modeled for print ads for regional and national retailers. At age 5, Colin broke into film as Clinton Jr. in the feature film Sweet Home Alabama. He obtained more roles in independent films such as Moved, The Book of Jaene and When Harry Met Lloyd: Dumb and Dumberer. In 2004 Colin portrayed Matthew Steed in the movie The Work and the Glory. 2005 marked a whirlwind year that began with a high profile photo shoot with Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie for W Magazine. This was immediately followed by a trip to Vancouver with Tom Welling and the cast of Smallville. Following Smallville, Colin reprised his role as Matthew Steed in The Work and the Gory: American Zion. If that werenât enough, Colin played a lead role, as Jackson Patch in The Dog Days of Summer, along with veteran actor Will Patton. Capping off a busy year, Colin was back in Vancouver playing Zeph, the son of Jason Statham and Claire Forlani in the epic adventure, In the Name of the King: A Dungeon Siege Story, in theaters January 2008. He stars in a new fim called "We Bought a Zoo." which premeres December, 2011. He plays the young and attractive son of a three-part family, with Matt Damon as the father, along with a little sister too. In addition to print, television and film, Colin also has a passion for voice work. Colin earned the role of Dart, the reindeer, performing with Kathy Bates, Andy Griffith, Jay Leno, Ed Asner, Shirley Jones, and many others in the feature film, Christmas Is Here Again to be released in 2008. When Colin is not acting he enjoys skateboarding, basketball and football. ==Filmography== ===Television=== {| class=wikitable |- ! Year !! Television series !! Role !!
